text:
Niranjan Bhagat (18 April 1926 – 1 February 2018) was an Indian poet and commentator. He was born in Ahmedabad, India. Bhagat won the 1999 Sahitya Akademi Award for Gujarati language for his work "Gujarati Sahiyta-Purvardha Uttarardha". He was also an English poet, and had written over a hundred poems in English, most being written in the style of "Gitanjali".
Bhagat died of a stroke on 1 February 2018 in Ahmedabad at the age of 91.
